name: Word IQ Sports Plus
description:
Resolve 500 unique word puzzles with increasing difficulty. Puzzles start with 4 letters and go up to 49 letters as you progress in the game.

All the words are within the category SPORTS (Sport and associated words).

Challenge your Friends as you rank up in the Game Center Leaderboard.

As you play, you will get additional HINTS to help you solving a puzzle if you need some help.

Resume automatically your game where you stopped, keeping your progress within the grid.

The Plus version contains:

-> No ADS
-> Unique puzzles
-> More HINTS to start with
-> Additional HINTS more often

NB: We have other unique word puzzles with different categories.
